title: Push Microsoft Edge Webdriver with windows 10 builds
body: Since Edge driver depends on windows 10 build version, is there any chance for the Edge driver to get shipped with windows 10 builds. something like it gets shipped natively like the native calc.exe in the system32 folder...

comments.body: I add +3 to this since we probably don't want to track compatibility between windows updates and EdgeDriver. Esp. once we start depending our test bed and update windows about every month.
